original_text: But the men were very good unto us, and we were not hurt, neither missed we any thing, as long as we were conversant with them, when we were in the fields:
korean_text: 우리가 들에 있어 그들과 상종할 동안에 그 사람들이 우리를 매우 선대하였으므로 우리가 다치거나 잃은 것이 없었으니

sentences.original_text: But the men were very good unto us
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 사람들은 우리에게 매우 좋았고

sentences.original_text: as long as we were conversant with them
when we were in the fields
